access_key.description: Specifies the access key AK. If omitted, the system will automatically generate it.

app_id.description: Specifies the application ID to which the access key belongs.

app_name.description: The name of the application to which the access key belongs.

create_time.description: The creation time of the access key, UNIX timestamp in milliseconds.

download_time.description: The time when the access key was downloaded, UNIX timestamp in milliseconds.

is_downloaded.description: Whether the access key has been downloaded.

is_imported.description: Whether the access key is imported.

region.description: Specifies the region in which to create the resource. If omitted, the provider-level region will be used.

secret_key.description: Specifies the access key SK. If omitted, the system will automatically generate it.

status.description: Specifies the status of the access key.

product.name: Data Encryption Workshop CPCS
product.name_cn: 密码安全中心-云平台密码系统服务
